sn22.99:4.3: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
sn22.99:4.4: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ mahāsamuddo ussussati visussati na bhavati;
sn22.99:4.5: na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
sn22.99:4.6: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ sineru pabbatarājā ḍayhati vinassati na bhavati;
sn22.99:4.7: na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
sn22.99:4.8: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ mahāpathavī ḍayhati vinassati na bhavati;
sn22.99:4.9: na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
sn22.99:5.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sā gaddulabaddho daḷhe khīle vā thambhe vā upanibaddho tameva khīlaṃ vā thambhaṃ vā anuparidhāvati anuparivattati;
sn22.99:5.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī … pe …
sn22.99:5.3: sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati … pe …
sn22.99:5.7: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.99:5.8: attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.99:5.9: So rūpaññeva anuparidhāvati anuparivattati, vedanaññeva … pe …
sn22.99:5.13: So rūpaṃ anuparidhāvaṃ anuparivattaṃ, vedanaṃ … pe …
sn22.99:5.16: viññāṇaṃ anuparidhāvaṃ anuparivattaṃ, na parimuccati rūpamhā, na parimuccati vedanāya, na parimuccati saññāya, na parimuccati saṅkhārehi, na parimuccati viññāṇamhā, na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn22.99:6.1: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī … pe …
sn22.99:6.2: sappurisadhamme suvinīto, na rūpaṃ attato samanupassati … pe …
sn22.99:6.6: na viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.99:6.7: na attani vā viññāṇaṃ, na viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.99:6.16: parimuccati rūpamhā, parimuccati vedanāya, parimuccati saññāya, parimuccati saṅkhārehi, parimuccati viññāṇamhā, parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
